sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO applicant ( applicant_idx, applicant_name, applicant_pass, applicant_age, applicant_tel, applicant_score ) VALUES ( student_idx_seq.nextval, #applicant_name#, #applicant_pass#, #applicant_age#, #applicant_tel#, #applicant_score# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM applicant WHERE applicant_name = #applicant_name# AND applicant_tel = #applicant_tel#
sqlMap.update: update Applicant set applicant_pass = #applicant_pass#, applicant_score = #applicant_pass# where applicant_name = #applicant_name# AND applicant_tel = #applicant_tel#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rownum, a.* FROM (SELECT a.* FROM APPLICANT a ORDER BY a.applicant_name) a WHERE rownum BETWEEN #first# AND #second#
